thread.title: John Birdwell Jr.
thread.title_full: Intoxalock reviewed by John Birdwell Jr.

author: John Birdwell Jr.
title: John Birdwell Jr.
text: The woman who helped us get everything up and running was very helpful and had a great attitude about everything. I appreciate everything she did even helping us reset up our online account. Thank you so much for all your help and making this process a lot easier on us.
